scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: echo 'Please run backend and frontend in separate terminals:' && echo '  Terminal 1: cd backend && npm run dev' && echo '  Terminal 2: cd frontend && npm run dev'
scripts.setup: cp .env.example backend/.env && npm run install-all && echo 'Setup complete! Edit backend/.env with your API key, then run: npm run check'
